title: [K-12] Attention-Guided Exemplar Learning Effectiveness Improvement Program

context.additional_context: Learners can access education solely via smartphones, with mobile-optimized content combining visual attention guidance and example-based learning

learning_goals: Learners can focus on key elements with over 85% accuracy when analyzing social case studies.
Learners show a performance improvement of over 70% after example-based learning.
Learners can explain at least two differences in learning effectiveness based on the application of attention-guiding techniques.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
